                   WorkCenter workcenter)

        Parameters:
        userId - Used to find user to update
        fname - First name of user
        lname - Last name of user
        password - Hashed password of the user
        user_role - Role of user
        workcenter - WorkCenter user belongs to

        Parameters:

        deleterId - user id
        Throws:

      • updateLockedStatus

        public int updateLockedStatus(int userId)
        Method to change the lock status to the opposite of the current status (True -> False, False -> True)
        Parameters:
        userId - The user to change lock status on
        Returns:
        0 if the user account is not locked, 1 if it is, and anything else if something went wrong.
